fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Taxation, Food Safety, Transport
eu_initiatives: Agriculture. Anti-dumping. Bioeconomy. Sustainability. Biofuels. Market access for agriculture goods. Trade negotiationes (Mercosur/UE). Sanitary and phytosanitary measures. Subsidies and countervailing measures. Common agriculture policy (CAP). Tariffs. Technical barriers to trade.
organisation_name: Bolsa de Cereales de Buenos Aires (BCBA)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
The Buenos Aires Grain Exchange is the oldest commercial institution in Argentina. It is a non-profit civil association that serves as an intermediate service provider. 
The Exchange main goals are to foster the development of the Argentine economy; to offer a meeting place to its members; and to encourage the creation of representative organizations for all the agribusiness sectors.
